resources.string: Write these words down and keep them safe. Do not lose these words or forget your passphrase.
Show extended public key for BIP44 account.
Show extended public key for BIP49 Segwit account (P2SH-wrapped).
Show extended public key for BIP84 Segwit account (Bech32).
Show extended public key for BIP84 Segwit account (Bech32) Whirlpool pre-mix.
Show extended public key for BIP84 Segwit account (Bech32) Whirlpool post-mix.
Show extended public key for BIP44 Whirlpool post-mix change account.
Show extended public key for BIP49 Segwit account (P2SH-wrapped) Whirlpool post-mix change account.
Show extended public key for BIP84 Segwit account (Bech32) Whirlpool bad bank.
Securely erase this wallet from the device.
Remove Samourai from the launcher and home screen. You must dial **YOUR_PIN_CODE# from the phone dialer to launch Samourai.
The block explorer used to view transaction details.
Send SMS to a trusted mobile number when the SIM card is changed.
Use trusted mobile number for remote
Only allow remote commands sent from your trusted mobile phone number.
A trusted mobile number that you can restrict remote access to (use int\'l format without spaces ex.: +447385555555).
Define a new PIN code; used to unlock your wallet.
Define alternative PIN for stealth launch and remote functions.
Periodically save passphrase encrypted backup to device storage.
Spends will use STONEWALL algorithm for increased obfuscation.
Spends will use replace-by-fee to enable fee bumping.
Verify wallet access and backup support.
Send wallet backup to tech support. Does not contain private key info.
Select your preferred transaction fee estimation provider.
Uncheck (broadcasting OFF) to copy raw signed transaction to the clipboard.
Strict control of transaction outputs and address reuse.
Generate segwit addresses for incoming transactions.
Broadcast any signed transaction supplied in hex format
Receive change to same type of address as spend output. Turn OFF to receive only to segwit change addresses.
Vibrate each digit on PIN code entry.
Prune wallet payload and backup files.
Calculate addresses derived from your wallet seed.
Calculate addresses shared with other PayNyms.
Current index values for this wallet.
Pair to Whirlpool GUI for continuous mixing.
Send wallet backup to tech support? Does not include any private key, seed, or passphrase info.
Are you sure you want to exit Samourai?
Your Samourai Wallet device now has a different SIM card corresponding to incoming number of this text message.
Create a PIN code between 5 and 8 characters.
No Internet connectivity. Please try again.
Please create a passphrase and keep it secret. You will need this passphrase if you lose access to your wallet.
Please confirm your passphrase. Keep it secret. You will need this passphrase if you lose access to your wallet.
Enter your mnemonic (or hex entropy) and, if necessary, your BIP39 passphrase. If you do not use a BIP39 passphrase, leave it blank.
Your wallet must use a passphrase. Please try again.
Passphrase does not match. Please try again.
Do not use any space characters in your passphrase. Please try again.
Wallet passphrase verified OK. Would you like to test decryption of the latest auto backup?
You have used this address before! Reusing addresses may result in a loss of privacy.
Joinbot not possible with current UTXO set
Only transaction using postmix account is possible
max amount reached for Joinbot (1.25 BTC)
Samourai does not handle transactions over 100KB in size. Please try splitting your transaction.
Copy this address to the clipboard? If copied, it may be visible to other applications.
Copy this transaction id to the clipboard? If copied, it may be visible to other applications.
Share this receive address? If shared, it may be read to other applications.
Are you sure you want to erase this wallet?
Do you want to copy ? If copied, content might be visible to other applications.
Privacy warning: be aware that you have already sent funds to this address.
Use scrambled numerical pad to enter your wallet.
SSL certificate pinning has failed. This might indicate malicious activity. Please verify your network connection and device before continuing.
We are unable to connect to the host to verify the SSL certificate. Please verify your network connection and device before continuing.
There was an error while encrypting your wallet backup. Please try again.
There was an error while decrypting your wallet backup. Please try again.
Backup found on device. To restore from existing backup, tap \'OK\', otherwise copy/paste different backup and tap \'OK\'.
Samourai Wallet cannot be run on this device
Are you sure you want to change your PIN?
Are you sure you want to create an alternative PIN to be used for stealth launch and remote commands?
You are not using any alternative PIN code for stealth and remote functions.
Wait for stealth launch mode to fully activate before defining an alternative PIN code.
Adding this PayNym to your contacts requires a one-time transaction fee for creating the record on the blockchain.
will be deducted from your wallet balance.
Scan or paste a payment code to create a new payment channel.
Notification transaction sent. Your payment channel is being created.
You must supply a label for this payment code
Cannot scan your own payment code
Verify that a signed message contains a valid signature
Sign message using BIP47 notification address private key?
Signed using my BIP47 notification address.
This payment channel is waiting for 1 confirmation before sending is activated. Would you like to discard the previous attempt and resend a notification?
The incoming transaction is replace-by-fee. View in block explorer?

Your wallet is not protected by a passphrase. Wallet backups are encrypted using your wallet passphrase. If you would like to use encrypted wallet backups and other Samourai Wallet features create your wallet using Samourai Wallet and transfer your funds.
A passphrase is required to use this function. Please consider creating a new wallet which will automatically include a passphrase.
Samourai APIs cannot be reached. Please verify connection and try again or try later.
Samourai APIs are returning an error. Please try again or try later.
The change from this transaction is a dust amount. Try again and either modify the spend amount or spend the entire balance.
insufficient balance for selected fee. Try again and either modify the spend amount or spend the entire balance.
Samourai is not routing via Tor. Tap to activate.
(includes 0.001 BTC fee to Samourai and miners\' fees)?
Do you want to rebroadcast this Ricochet spend?
There was a problem broadcasting your Ricochet. Do you want to rebroadcast this Ricochet spend?
There is no Ricochet to be resent.
There is no Ricochet script to display.
Unable to mask outgoing payment code
Spend failed. Server returned null value.
This transaction is awaiting confirmation. Please select an option:
Cannot retrieve transaction information. Please try again.
Be advised that bumping the fee may not be necessary for this transaction.
Would you like to increase the miner fee of this transaction for quicker confirmation?\n\nAdditional Miner Fee:
Your fee selection is set to:
Set your custom fee in sat/vB.
Custom fee is set too low.
Custom fee is set too high.
Cannot make transaction with dust output.
Error reading payload. Please try again.
Sign message using this private key?
Your wallet recovery words and passphrase will be displayed. Do not allow anyone to view your screen. This will NOT be displayed again.
As a reminder, your PIN code is:
Raw transaction too large to display in QR code.
Funds deposited in Segwit addresses are more efficient to transact with. Offering reduced miner fees when sending bitcoin from your wallet.
A private key has been identified in your clipboard. Delete the clipboard contents?
An unexpected dust transaction into your wallet can indicate an attempt to track your wallet addresses and spending.\n\nMark this dust as unspendable to mitigate against 3rd party tracking attempts.
This dust transaction is currently blocked from spending. Unblock this unspent entry for possible spending?
Check box to not warn about repeat sends to this address.
Mark the unspent outputs that compose the inputs to this transaction as unspendable?
Error: This is not a valid bitcoin request. Samourai only supports sending to valid bitcoin addresses.
Allow your friends & contacts to find and connect to your PayNym directly through compatible bitcoin wallets.
Unique name and image generated with a hash of your PayNym code. No two will ever be the same!
No identity checks! Your name and image are based on your PayNym code, not any national ID card.
Be found easily! Compatible wallets can search for new contacts and send private secure payments without leaving a trace.
Not interested. Don\'t ask me again.
Claim my PayNymID and add my public PayNym code to PayNym.is?
Adding a PayNym to your contacts requires a one-time transaction fee for creating the record on the blockchain. Deposit
BTC into your wallet and try again.
I understand that Samourai cannot provide assistance in the case of lost or forgotten passphrases. Samourai never has any knowledge of my passphrase.
Create a secure passphrase for your wallet
import an encrypted Samourai backup to restore a wallet with all meta-data intact
Enter your mnemonic seed to import a wallet from another provider.

I confirm that I have written the above words down and have stored them in a safe and secure location. I understand that anyone who has access to both my passphrase and my recovery words will be able to access my wallet and all my funds.
It is not safe to keep these words backed up on your computer or in the cloud. Write these words down on a piece of paper and keep it secret and secure.
These words are a backup of all the secret keys in your wallet.
Requesting SMS and Phone state permission
Your wallet needs access to SMS send and receive so it can use remote alert features.
Your wallet needs access to outgoing calls so it can use the stealth launch feature.
Your wallet needs access to file storage so it can automatically save an encrypted backup of your wallet to your device.
Your wallet needs access to the camera so it can scan QR codes.
A STONEWALL spend could not be composed with your current set of unspents. If you require a STONEWALL spend tap \'NO\' and try again with a modified set of unspents.
Be advised that \'Receive change to like-typed outputs\' is OFF and can result in a less optimal transaction structure for your STONEWALL spend.
Cannot broadcast transaction without a data connection. How would you like to proceed?
Samourai Wallet is in offline mode.
Your Samourai Wallet broadcasting is switched off.
Additional hops between your wallet and the final destination for increased fungibility
Amount will be sent as a coinjoin output
STONEWALL increases deniability and reduces linkability of this transaction.
Cycling bitcoin through the \n whirlpool will cover the tracks your \n transactions leave behind
Your private keys never leave the\n device at any point during the\n Whirlpool cycle
Pay a small fee for a fast cycle or \n earn a small BTC reward when you\n complete a slow cycle
Your coins will be added to the top of the queue for immediate processing
Your coins will be added to the bottom of the queue but will earn a small BTC reward when the cycle completes
You do not yet have any PayNym contacts
Your staggered Ricochet has been forwarded for broadcast. Please wait until the block height permits the broadcasting of all the transactions in the series.
Your staggered Ricochet could not be forwarded for broadcast. Please try again.
Powering Samourai Wallet with your own personal node offers the best level of privacy and independence when interacting with the bitcoin network. Dojo makes running a full node easy and simple.

- Plug and Play full bitcoin node

 -Automatically configured Tor hidden service

 -Independence from default Samourai servers

If you already have a Dojo Full Node or are 
running the free and open source Dojo Software
on your own hardware, scan the pairing QR code
located on the Dojo Maintenance control panel
Power Samourai with your own personal DOJO full node
Create wallet and pair to Dojo
to participate in Cahoots CoinJoin transactions with them. No need to connect to use Cahoots!
to generate unique private addresses for sending bitcoin to this contact
Balance and transaction history will not be updated until a working data connection is established
This fee covers the cost of creating a one-time transaction to create a record on the blockchain. This keeps PayNyms decentralized
A one time connection fee of will be charged to connect to this PayNym
Cannot prepare pair to Whirlpool GUI.
Please note that spending from your post-mix account without using STONEWALL will result in a loss of the privacy gained through Whirlpool.
Share this QR code with your participant
Tor cannot be stopped since wallet is connected to a Samourai Dojo node.
Uninstall Samourai Wallet to unpair from your Dojo node. \'DISABLE\' will be fully activated in a later update.
Continue exchanging QR codes\n until the transaction is broadcast!
Confirm that you wish to broadcast this transaction.
Scan the QR CODE that your collaborator provides you.
Create an on demand CoinJoin transaction for enhanced privacy and surveillance protection
Reveal the redeem script for this address
Your selection contains blocked UTXOs. Please remove and try again.
UTXO is Blocked. Please remove and try again.
Only a single UTXO may be selected for direct spend from post-mix.
Only a single UTXO may be selected for direct Whirlpooling from post-mix.

resources.string: The change output from this Tx0 will be tagged. Block it to make it unspendable? If so, the amount will not be reflected in the total balance but will be visible within the wallet by consulting the list of unspents.
Enter your Whirlpool SCODE. If confirmed by pressing \'OK\' the Whirlpool service will close. Re-enter Whirlpool to activate the SCODE.
This UTXO is marked as Spendable
This UTXO is marked as Blocked
This transaction will spend the entirety of your wallet. Are you sure that you want to do this?
This transaction will spend the entirety of your post-mix wallet which will undo the privacy attained via Whirlpool mixing. Are you sure that you want to do this?
Strict mode has detected possible address reuse for this transaction. Reformulate the transaction or broadcast as-is?
No UTXOs found for this private key.
NOTE: Privacy addons are not available for selected utxo\'s
NOTE: You are making a post-mix spend. If #Cahoots\nis not selected Samourai will attempt to make a STONEWALL spend.
For extra privacy and analysis resistance, each hop will appear in mempool 1 block apart. Designed to be slow. Do not enable for urgent sends.
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
No cahoots detected. Refresh to search again
Based on cryptography and math, not your personal information
Find and follow your friends and contacts without harming your privacy
Unlocks advanced privacy functionality in your wallet
Share and reuse without revealing your other transactions and balances
Have your mixing partner scan the QR to start.
Are you sure want to clear batch list?
Break free of third party custody. Remain in complete control of your wallet at all times.
The perfect toolbox for managing your bitcoin experience privately
Offline mode allows you to interact with your bitcoin even without data
Connect your wallet to your own full bitcoin node with a single QR scan
Do you want to unpair dojo ?
Unable to connect Dojo. Please check the api key or Dojo status
Your passphrase will not be shown to you again.
Your passphrase is a required part of your\noffline paper backup. Without it you\ncannot restore your wallet
Write these words down and keep them\nsecret. Together with your passphrase\nthey allow access to your wallet

Without a backup your bitcoin wallet is at
risk of unrecoverable loss.

Download and print the PDF template to
make the backup as easy as possible.
Restoring a wallet? No problem, let\'s figure out what kind of restore to perform.
I have a Samourai backup file
Before anything else, let\'s take\ncare of some network\nhousekeeping.
Would you like to enable Tor?
Would you like to connect to your\nown Dojo server?
Passphrase is required for Samourai import
This field cannot be left blank!
Your wallet needs access to file storage so it can automatically save an encrypted backup of your wallet to your device. Please choose a directory.
Whirlpool completely breaks the past links of your bitcoin from their future activity to help protect your privacy when using Bitcoin.
Whirlpool is entirely non custodial. This means you keep full control of your bitcoin private keys at all steps of the process
Coins that are currently waiting to complete their first Whirlpool mix will be listed and managed here.
Your coins will be split into identical size amounts automatically. Each of these identical amount coins will be mixed individually.\n\nYour wallet can only mix while it is online and unlocked.
Coins that have been mixed at least once will automatically be queued and randomly selected for free remixing.

Whirlpool offers absolutely free remixing for previously mixed coins. These transactions are without any miner fee or coordinator fees.\n\nRemixing increases your privacy gains and increases the privacy of the entire mixing pool.
Your mixed coins have been automatically queued for remixing.\n\nAdd some more unmixed coins to Whirlpool at any time.
Once you spend a mixed coin it is no longer eligible for free Remixing.\n\nAdd some more unmixed coins to Whirlpool at any time.
You don\'t have any remixable coins
You cannot follow your own PayNym
Tx0 is not possible with selected UTXO.
Samourai Wallet controlled servers will act as a participant to create this CoinJoin. This is the easiest and quickest option.
Manually compose this transaction with another participant who is using Samourai Wallet. Perfect for face-to-face interaction.
Compose this transaction online with another participant who is using Samourai Wallet over Tor.
Pin must be between 5 and 8 digits long
Pins do not match, try again.
Enter a private key and sweep any funds to\nyour next bitcoin address
Sign messages using your wallet private key
Calculate all past and future addresses in your wallet
Simple and secure password-free authentication using your unique PayNym code
Unable to compose transaction, output value will be dust
Unable to compose transaction invalid fees.
Do you want to enable stealth mode ?
Do you want to disable stealth mode ?
Enable stealth mode to protect against physical searches of your device
Cannot use wallet pin for stealth mode. please choose a different code

You are about to create a TESTNET wallet. TESTNET is used for experimenting and development testing.

All wallet tools are available, but will only function with TESTNET bitcoin.

Do you wish to proceed?
Upon exiting Samourai Wallet, Stealth Mode is enabled automatically
